Client password
Client username

single_nested.description: Authentication details (username and password) for accessing the server.

string.description: Credentials such as a token value
Authorization type

single_nested.description: Authorization token for accessing the server.

bool.description: If enabled, includes metadata in the write requests.

string.description: Interval at which metadata is sent to the remote server.

int64.description: Maximum number of metadata entries to be sent per Write request.

single_nested.description: Configuration related to sending metadata to the remote server.

string.description: Path to the Certificate Authority file for verifying the server certificate.
Path to the client certificate file.
Path to the client key file.

single_nested.description: TLS configuration for secure connection to the remote server.

string.description: Remote server address for sending metrics.

int64.description: The buffer size threshold that initiates sending the accumulated metrics to the remote destination once reached.

string.description:
Interval at which metrics stored in the local buffer are sent to the remote server.
Metrics are sent regardless of the buffer size threshold.
Header name
Header value

list_nested.description: Custom HTTP headers to be sent along with each remote write request.

int64.description: The total number of times to retry sending a message
Maximum number of metrics per write request.

string.description: Write client timeout.

single_nested.description: Remote write options such as: Flush interval, Retries, etc.
ClusterDestinationSpec defines the desired state of ClusterDestination

string.description: Last encountered error for this destination.
Last checked time for connectivity status

bool.description: Indicates if the destination is reachable.

string.description: name of the ClusterExport
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash

list.description: List of remote destination names where metrics will be written.
Optional set of fields to be exposed by this export.

string.description: Period defines the frequency at which the metric is polled.
The field name to add as a label
The state DB path to export, in the format '.node.srl.interface'
A regular expression to be applied to the field value.
A regular expression replacement to be applied to the field value.

list_nested.description: List of dynamic labels to add to the metrics, based on a state DB path.

string.description: Label name.
Label value.

list_nested.description: List of static labels to add to the metrics.

single_nested.description: Allows adding static or dynamic labels to the metrics.

string.description: The new value for the mapped source (must convert to float64).
The value to be mapped (supports regex with capture groups).

list_nested.description: Rules for mapping metric values (e.g., DOWN -> 1, UP -> 2).

string.description: Regular expression for the metric name transformation.
Replacement string for the transformed metric name.

single_nested.description: Regex and replacement for renaming the metric name.

string.description: Mode defines how the metric is collected: periodic, on-change, or periodic-on-change.
The state DB path to export, in the format '.namespace.node.srl.interface'
The CR group such as `core.eda.nokia.com`.
The CR kind such as `toponode`.

list.description:
List of labels to include with the metric.
Include all if not set.

string.description:
CR name to be queried.
Get all of not set.
The CR namespace, it defaults to all if not specified.
The CR version such as `v1` or `v1alpha1`.

single_nested.description:
A Custom resource to be used as a source for the metric.
It will generate a metric with the CR labels and a value of 1.

string.description: Condition for filtering the metric (e.g., 'oper-state = down').

list_nested.description:
List of metrics and their sources to be written to a remote server.
Metrics will be sent using the Prometheus remote write protocol.
